items.content_html: 📋 Angular Material & RxJS Observables are used to display my data. A Google Cloud Firestore NoSQL database stores the blog posts & Contact Form data. Anyone can read the blog posts. Angularfire-lite was used as a Firebase API wrapper as it is simple and lightweight, reducing Vendor bundle size & improving the Chrome Lighthouse score.
items.title: AndrewJBateman/angular-material-portfolio: :clipboard:  Angular Material & RxJS Observables are used to display my data. A Google Cloud Firestore NoSQL database stores the blog posts & Contact Form data. Anyone can read the blog posts. Angularfire-lite was used as a Firebase API wrapper as it is simple and lightweight, reducing Vendor bundle size & improving the Chrome Lighthouse score.

items.content_html: Modern, simple, lightweight (~5kb gzip) form validation library written in Typescript, with no dependencies (no JQuery!). Support a wide range of predefined rules, async, files, dates validation, custom error messages and styles, localization. Support writing custom rules and plugins.
items.title: horprogs/Just-validate: Modern, simple, lightweight (~5kb gzip) form validation library written in Typescript, with no dependencies (no JQuery!). Support a wide range of predefined rules, async, files, dates validation, custom error messages and styles, localization. Support writing custom rules and plugins.

items.content_html: Polywrap is a wasm standard for integrating Web3 protocols into applications. This eliminates the need for client-side SDKs, making dapps lightweight and multi-platform.
